name: Nick's Adventure
description:
Nick’s Adventure is a high-octane platformer game, where you take the role of Nick, to stop the despicable Robo Egg from creating his own reality with the Time Rifts.

Travel through 8 worlds each with 4 levels, freeing the land from the robots and mystical foes that lie within. Along with the main campaign, there are also bonus speed levels that serve as extra content to complete.

Controls/Abilities:

Use the arrow keys to move and the space button jump, you can occasionally climb and swim with the up key on ineractable surfaces. As well as that, there are a few abilities you have. You can hold up and jump on an interactable surface to 'superclimb' or 'superswim', you can skim on the top of these surface by pressing the same thing.
